 It's like this stuff. I was just demonstrating the manual sweep method to=
 a co-worker, and they talk to him, but nothing really profound, other than=
 the fact that they talk. Maybe I'm just trying to define what it is that t=
alks. What level of spirit, or being is it? I don't think it's the classic =
paranormal idea of ghosts. 
 
 Frank-S

 It's like this stuff. I was just demonstrating the manual=
 sweep method to a co-worker, and they talk to him, but nothing really prof=
ound, other than the fact that they talk. Maybe I'm just trying to def=
ine what it is that talks. What level of spirit, or being is it? I don't th=
ink it's the classic paranormal idea of ghosts. <BR>
 <BR>
 Frank=
-S<BR><BR><BR>
